dct_title_s: Die gantze Welt in ein Kleeberblat
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, places of historical interest.
Features illustrations of sea monsters, mermaids, and a ship.
"4" -- top left margin ; "5" -- top right margin.
Clover-leaf shaped map of the world showing three principal continents - Africa, Europe, and Asia. Jerusalem is in the center. America is in lower left corner. England and Scandinavia are at the top.
Appears in B端nting's Itinerarium sacrae scripturae, Magdeburg, 1581.
